summary: I'm a passionate software developer with an aptitude for leadership. I have a solid experience in designing and developing products as well as leading teams towards the accomplishment of the mission.

experience.title: Lead software developer
experience.text: As lead developer, I was responsible for both technical decisions and project management, leading a team of twelve developers and one designer. As the first hire of the tech team, I was tasked with the hiring of all the other team members and leading them. I was also tasked with translating the stakeholders desiderata into projects, by planning product development and timelines.

experience.title: Frontend Lead developer
experience.text: As frontend lead developer, I was responsible for leading a team of five developers and two designers, with both project management and technical leadership. I was also responsible for the team hiring process. I designed and executed the migration of the frontend application from Knockout to React, with Redux and Redux Saga for state management.

experience.title: Fullstack developer
experience.text: As a fullstack developer I was tasked with building the company main product, Crystal, working both on the frontend and the backend. I've also managed the migration of the product from GCE to AWS.

experience.title: Junior fullstack developer
experience.text: At Thux I was developing various products for clients, using Python, Django and VueJs
